cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6219

description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the jbg_dec_in function in libjbig/jbig.c in JBIG-KIT before 2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted image file.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6369

description: Buffer overflow in the printbuf APIs in json-c before 0.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6370

description: The hash functionality in json-c before 0.12 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via crafted JSON data, involving collisions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6371

description: Cumin (aka MRG Management Console), as used in Red Hat Enterprise MRG 2.5, uses the DES-based crypt function to hash passwords, which makes it easier for attackers to obtain sensitive information via a brute-force attack.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6445

description: JBoss Drools, Red Hat JBoss BRMS before 6.0.1, and Red Hat JBoss BPM Suite before 6.0.1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary Java code via a (1) MVFLEX Expression Language (MVEL) or (2) Drools expression.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6468

description: JBoss Overlord Run Time Governance (RTGov) 1.0 for JBossAS allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary Java code via an MVFLEX Expression Language (MVEL) expression.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6469

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IBM SmartCloud Analytics Log Analysis 1.1 and 1.2 before 1.2.0.0-CSI-SCALA-IF0003 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an invalid query parameter in a response from an OAuth authorization endpoint.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6738

description: OpenJPEG 1.5.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via unspecified vectors that trigger NULL pointer dereferences, division-by-zero, and other errors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6887

description: FortiGuard FortiAuthenticator before 3.0 allows remote administrators to gain privileges via the command line interface.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-6990

description: The Invitation module 7.x-2.x for Drupal does not properly check permissions, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified default views.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7063

description: The put_call function in the API client (api/api_client.rb) in the BaseSpace Ruby SDK (aka bio-basespace-sdk) gem 0.1.7 for Ruby uses the API_KEY on the command line, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by listing the processes.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7111

description: Juvia uses the same secret key for all installations, which allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact by leveraging the secret key in app/config/initializers/secret_token.rb, related to cookies.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7134

description: PHPFox 3.7.3 and 3.7.4 allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended "Only Me" restrictions and "like" a publication via a request that specifies the ID for the publication.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7195

description: static/ajax.php in PHPFox 3.7.3, 3.7.4, and 3.7.5 allows remote authenticated users to bypass intended "Only Me" restrictions and comment on a private publication via a request with a modified val[item_id] parameter for the publication.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7196

description: js/ui/screenShield.js in GNOME Shell (aka gnome-shell) before 3.8 allows physically proximate attackers to execute arbitrary commands by leveraging an unattended workstation with the keyboard focus on the Activities search.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7220

description: The automatic screen lock functionality in GNOME Shell (aka gnome-shell) before 3.10 does not prevent access to the "Enter a Command" dialog, which allows physically proximate attackers to execute arbitrary commands by leveraging an unattended workstation.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7221

description: Simple Machines Forum (SMF) before 1.1.19 and 2.x before 2.0.6 allows remote attackers to conduct clickjacking attacks via an X-Frame-Options header.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7234

description: Simple Machines Forum (SMF) before 1.1.19 and 2.x before 2.0.6 allows remote attackers to impersonate arbitrary users via multiple space characters characters.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7235

description: Simple Machines Forum (SMF) 2.0.6, 1.1.19, and earlier allows remote attackers to impersonate arbitrary users via a Unicode homoglyph character in a username.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7236

description: GNOME Display Manager (gdm) 3.4.1 and earlier, when disable-user-list is set to true, allows local users to cause a denial of service (unable to login) by pressing the cancel button after entering a user name.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2013-7273
